channel.title: Adding Safe Zones?
channel.description: I Am Completely blank on how to add safe zones.. Im trying to make the "Adminzone" on pimpscape a safe zone, and some other places, but dont know exactly how to add/what to add. I know you go into client.java and hit ctrl+f "nonwild", but i dont know the coord deal. anyone know how i can do this?

item.title: Adding Safe Zones?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“BlameGod_x, post:2, topic:82911”]Ok, the first number in the new line is the X coordinate of the most northwestern corner. The very last number is the Y coordinate

The second number is the X coordinate of the of the most southeastern corner. And finally, the third number is the Y coordinate.[/quote] Do you make any sense?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Safe Zones?
item.dc:creator: @BlameGod_x BlameGod_x
item.description:
@BlameGod_x wrote:

Ok, the first number in the new line is the X coordinate of the most northwestern corner. The very last number is the Y coordinate

The second number is the X coordinate of the of the most southeastern corner. And finally, the third number is the Y coordinate.
